annathemostawesome: Thank you for sharing your story ❤️ so much love to you guys and your angels 🌷 i had three miscarriages (i have no idea how to spell that) before and now i have no one to try with! So happy that you two have eachother ❤️

urthalun: I am personally grateful for finding you, across all these miles. ❤️
glowy_by_isha: This is something so close to my heart, numerous miscarriages later i had my rainbow baby. Lots of love and hugs .

schmidt_storm: My sister had a miscarriage about five years ago. To this day I still don’t have the right words to make it better, though I’ve tried tirelessly. I feel for you, and send love. 💕
geekbride: Thank you for sharing your story 💜
singaporeactually: I’m so sorry for your pain & loss 💕🙏🏽
jennoden: Thank you for sharing. Me too 💙
fatinternetmom: My daughter was stillborn in September of 2016. We are lucky enough to have a happy healthy rainbow baby, but the emptiness never goes away. I never stop thinking about all the things our son will do that our daughter will never be able to.
hollyreubs: Me too. 10 years ago and 8 years ago. Always loved, never forgotten. Sending you lots of love
sundarciriya: Thank you so much for sharing your story!
